
Compiling Asgn1_CS19B1017_mth1.c (method-1):
$ gcc -pthread Asgn1_CS19B1017_mth1.c -o method_1.out

Compiling Asgn1_CS19B1017_mth2.c (method-2):
$ gcc -pthread Asgn1_CS19B1017_mth2.c -o method_2.out

Input: create a file named inp.txt containing two space seperated integers n and p, Ex
5 2

Running Method-1:
$ ./method_1.out < inp.txt > output.txt

Running Method-2:
$ ./method_2.out < inp.txt > output.txt

Output.txt will contain Array values before sorting, Array values after sorting and time taken in sorting , Ex : 
1804289383 846930886 1681692777 1714636915 1957747793 424238335 719885386 1649760492 596516649 1189641421 1025202362 1350490027 783368690 1102520059 2044897763 1967513926 1365180540 1540383426 304089172 1303455736 35005211 521595368 294702567 1726956429 336465782 861021530 278722862 233665123 2145174067 468703135 1101513929 1801979802 
35005211 233665123 278722862 294702567 304089172 336465782 424238335 468703135 521595368 596516649 719885386 783368690 846930886 861021530 1025202362 1101513929 1102520059 1189641421 1303455736 1350490027 1365180540 1540383426 1649760492 1681692777 1714636915 1726956429 1801979802 1804289383 1957747793 1967513926 2044897763 2145174067 
Time taken:1473.000000 Microseconds
